trans-unit.source: Contains information about a change that has taken place in a date and time picker (DTP) control

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about a change that has taken place in a date and time picker (DTP) control

target.mrk: Contains information about a change that has taken place in a date and time picker (DTP) control

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a notification message.

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about a notification message.

target.mrk: Contains information about a notification message.

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the control is set to "no date" status. This flag also specifies whether the contents of the date are valid and contain current time information. This value can be one of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the control is set to "no date" status.
This flag also specifies whether the contents of the date are valid and contain current time information.
This value can be one of the following:

target.mrk: Indicates if the control is set to "no date" status.
This flag also specifies whether the contents of the date are valid and contain current time information.
This value can be one of the following:

trans-unit.source: $GDT_NONE - The control is set to "no date" status

seg-source.mrk: $GDT_NONE - The control is set to "no date" status

target.mrk: $GDT_NONE - The control is set to "no date" status

trans-unit.source: $GDT_VALID - The control is not set to the "no date" status

seg-source.mrk: $GDT_VALID - The control is not set to the "no date" status

target.mrk: $GDT_VALID - The control is not set to the "no date" status

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the current system date and time.

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about the current system date and time.

target.mrk: Contains information about the current system date and time.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used with the $DTN_DATETIMECHANGE notification message.

seg-source.mrk: This structure is used with the $DTN_DATETIMECHANGE notification message.

target.mrk: This structure is used with the $DTN_DATETIMECHANGE notification message.
